title: Track Awesome Opentofu Updates Weekly
_seo_title: Track Awesome Opentofu (virtualroot/awesome-opentofu) Updates Weekly - Track Awesome List
description: A curated list of OpenTofu tools, resources, and related projects.

items.title: Awesome Opentofu Updates on Jul 07 - Jul 13, 2025
items.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Jul 07 - Jul 13, 2025
items.content_text:
### Tools / CI

*   [Burrito](https://docs.burrito.tf/overview/) - Burrito is a TACoS (Terraform Automation and Collaboration Software) that works inside Kubernetes.

### Tools / Helpers

*   [zed Extension (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/ashpool37/zed-extension-opentofu) - Extension for the Zed Editor.

Tools / CI

items.title: Awesome Opentofu Updates on Jun 30 - Jul 06, 2025
items.summary: 14 awesome projects updated on Jun 30 - Jul 06, 2025
items.content_text:
### Official

*   [Registry (‚≠ê375)](https://github.com/opentofu/registry)
*   [Registry MCP Server (‚≠ê37)](https://github.com/opentofu/opentofu-mcp-server#opentofu-mcp-server)
*   [Technical Steering Committee updates (‚≠ê0)](https://github.com/opentofu/org/tree/main/TSC)

### Features

*   [1.10 - Enhanced moved and removed blocks](https://opentofu.org/docs/intro/whats-new/#enhanced-moved-and-removed-blocks)
*   [1.10 - External key providers](https://opentofu.org/docs/intro/whats-new/#external-key-providers)
*   [1.10 - OCI registry support](https://opentofu.org/docs/cli/oci_registries/)
*   [1.10 - S3 native state locking](https://opentofu.org/docs/intro/whats-new/#native-s3-state-locking)
*   [1.10 - Target and exclude files](https://opentofu.org/docs/intro/whats-new/#target-and-exclude-files)
*   [1.8 - Override files for OpenTofu (.tofu)](https://opentofu.org/docs/intro/whats-new/#override-files-for-opentofu-keeping-compatibility)
*   [1.7 - Loopable import blocks](https://opentofu.org/docs/v1.7/intro/whats-new/#loopable-import-blocks)

### Tools / Registry

*   [tofuref (‚≠ê13)](https://github.com/djetelina/tofuref) - TUI for OpenTofu provider registry.

### Tools / Helpers

*   [OpenTofu Language Server (‚≠ê95)](https://github.com/opentofu/tofu-ls) - OpenTofu Language Server.
*   [VS Code Extension](https://open-vsx.org/extension/OpenTofu/vscode-opentofu) - Extension for Visual Studio Code with the OpenTofu Language Server adds editing features for OpenTofu files such as syntax highlighting, IntelliSense, code navigation, code formatting, module explorer.

### Media / Helpers

*   [CNCF - OpenTofu Day Europe 2025](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLj6h78yzYM2P1WUOx9Ny6Q3JJxiAs1A3M)
items.content_html:
Official

  • Registry (‚≠ê375)
  • Registry MCP Server (‚≠ê37)
  • Technical Steering Committee updates (‚≠ê0)

Features

  • 1.10 - Enhanced moved and removed blocks
  • 1.10 - External key providers
  • 1.10 - OCI registry support
  • 1.10 - S3 native state locking
  • 1.10 - Target and exclude files
  • 1.8 - Override files for OpenTofu (.tofu)
  • 1.7 - Loopable import blocks

Tools / Registry

  • tofuref (‚≠ê13) - TUI for OpenTofu provider registry.

Tools / Helpers

  • OpenTofu Language Server (‚≠ê95) - OpenTofu Language Server.
  • VS Code Extension - Extension for Visual Studio Code with the OpenTofu Language Server adds editing features for OpenTofu files such as syntax highlighting, IntelliSense, code navigation, code formatting, module explorer.

Media / Helpers

  • CNCF - OpenTofu Day Europe 2025

items.content_text:
### Tools / Tests

*   [Terratest (‚≠ê7.7k)](https://github.com/gruntwork-io/terratest) - Go library that makes writing automated tests for your infrastructure code easier.

### Tools / Platforms

*   [terrakube (‚≠ê666)](https://github.com/AzBuilder/terrakube) - Open-source platform with a private registry, remote state, custom flows, scheduled workspaces, and visual states.

### Tools / Registry

*   [library.tf](https://library.tf/) - An indexer of registries for providers and modules with insights and documentation.

items.title: Awesome Opentofu Updates on Feb 26 - Mar 03, 2024
items.summary: 12 awesome projects updated on Feb 26 - Mar 03, 2024
items.content_text:
### Tools / Wrappers

*   [Terragrunt (‚≠ê8.8k)](https://github.com/gruntwork-io/terragrunt) - Keep your configurations DRY, work with multiple modules, and manage remote state.
*   [tf (‚≠ê79)](https://github.com/dex4er/tf) - Less verbose and more friendly command outputs.

### Tools / Registry

*   [boring-registry (‚≠ê209)](https://github.com/boring-registry/boring-registry) - Boring-registry is an open-source module and provider registry compatible with OpenTofu.
*   [hermitcrab (‚≠ê33)](https://github.com/seal-io/hermitcrab) - Registry network mirroring service compatible with OpenTofu.
*   [terrac (‚≠ê32)](https://github.com/haoliangyu/terrac) - Minimal private module registry compatible with OpenTofu.
*   [GitLab Module Registry](https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/user/packages/terraform_module_registry/) - Use GitLab projects as a private registry for terraform modules.
*   [terralist (‚≠ê415)](https://github.com/terralist/terralist) - Private registry for providers and modules.
*   [citizen (‚≠ê641)](https://github.com/outsideris/citizen) - Private registry for modules and providers with support for multiple databases and storages.
*   [petra (‚≠ê44)](https://github.com/devoteamgcloud/petra) - Private registry manager using Google Cloud Storage.
*   [terraform-registry (‚≠ê109)](https://github.com/nrkno/terraform-registry) - Modules registry with authentication and support for multiple backends.
*   [terrareg (‚≠ê303)](https://github.com/MatthewJohn/terrareg) - Open-source modules registry with UI, optional Git integration and deep analysis.
*   [terustry (‚≠ê67)](https://github.com/veepee-oss/terustry) - Proxy registry for providers.
items.content_html:
Tools / Wrappers

  • Terragrunt (‚≠ê8.8k) - Keep your configurations DRY, work with multiple modules, and manage remote state.
  • tf (‚≠ê79) - Less verbose and more friendly command outputs.

Tools / Registry

  • boring-registry (‚≠ê209) - Boring-registry is an open-source module and provider registry compatible with OpenTofu.
  • hermitcrab (‚≠ê33) - Registry network mirroring service compatible with OpenTofu.
  • terrac (‚≠ê32) - Minimal private module registry compatible with OpenTofu.
  • GitLab Module Registry - Use GitLab projects as a private registry for terraform modules.
  • terralist (‚≠ê415) - Private registry for providers and modules.
  • citizen (‚≠ê641) - Private registry for modules and providers with support for multiple databases and storages.
  • petra (‚≠ê44) - Private registry manager using Google Cloud Storage.
  • terraform-registry (‚≠ê109) - Modules registry with authentication and support for multiple backends.
  • terrareg (‚≠ê303) - Open-source modules registry with UI, optional Git integration and deep analysis.
  • terustry (‚≠ê67) - Proxy registry for providers.

items.title: Awesome Opentofu Updates on Feb 19 - Feb 25, 2024
items.summary: 12 awesome projects updated on Feb 19 - Feb 25, 2024
items.content_text:
### Official

*   [Fork announcement](https://opentofu.org/announcement)

### Tools / Wrappers

*   [Atmos (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/cloudposse/atmos) - Orchestration tool that keeps environment configuration DRY.
*   [easy\_infra (‚≠ê74)](https://github.com/SeisoLLC/easy_infra) - Docker container to simplify and secure the use of infrastructure as code.
*   [tfam (‚≠ê24)](https://github.com/Ant0wan/tfam) - Rust-powered wrapper for concurrent Terraform/OpenTofu apply, enabling multi-deployment support.
*   [tfexe (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/Ant0wan/tfexe) - Rust-powered wrapper for seamless execution of tfswitch and Terraform/OpenTofu with version control.

### Tools / CI

*   [pre-commit-opentofu (‚≠ê69)](https://github.com/tofuutils/pre-commit-opentofu) - Git pre-commit hooks plugin.

### Tools / State

*   [tfmigrate (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/minamijoyo/tfmigrate) - State migration tool.

### Tools / Providers

*   [tfschema (‚≠ê306)](https://github.com/minamijoyo/tfschema) - Schema inspector for providers.

### Tools / Platforms

*   [digger (‚≠ê4.6k)](https://github.com/diggerhq/digger) - Open-source IaC orchestration tool. Digger allows you to run IaC in your existing CI pipeline.

### Tools / Helpers

*   [terratag (‚≠ê983)](https://github.com/env0/terratag) - CLI tool allowing for tags or labels to be applied across an entire set of OpenTofu/Terraform files.

### Learning / Helpers

*   [OpenTofu Course](https://killercoda.com/quincycheng/course/course_opentofu) - Interactive tutorials.
*   [Terraform in Depth](https://www.manning.com/books/terraform-in-depth) - Book with OpenTofu sections.
items.content_html:
Official

  • Fork announcement

Tools / Wrappers

  • Atmos (‚≠ê1.1k) - Orchestration tool that keeps environment configuration DRY.
  • easy_infra (‚≠ê74) - Docker container to simplify and secure the use of infrastructure as code.
  • tfam (‚≠ê24) - Rust-powered wrapper for concurrent Terraform/OpenTofu apply, enabling multi-deployment support.
  • tfexe (‚≠ê3) - Rust-powered wrapper for seamless execution of tfswitch and Terraform/OpenTofu with version control.

Tools / CI

  • pre-commit-opentofu (‚≠ê69) - Git pre-commit hooks plugin.

Tools / State

  • tfmigrate (‚≠ê1.2k) - State migration tool.

Tools / Providers

  • tfschema (‚≠ê306) - Schema inspector for providers.

Tools / Platforms

  • digger (‚≠ê4.6k) - Open-source IaC orchestration tool. Digger allows you to run IaC in your existing CI pipeline.

Tools / Helpers

  • terratag (‚≠ê983) - CLI tool allowing for tags or labels to be applied across an entire set of OpenTofu/Terraform files.

Learning / Helpers

  • OpenTofu Course - Interactive tutorials.
  • Terraform in Depth - Book with OpenTofu sections.

items.content_text:
